間服: (あいふく) - between-season wear; spring and autumn clothing; spring and fall clothing

間違い: (machigai) - mistake, error, blunder; accident, mishap, trouble , mistake, error, blunder; accident, mishap, trouble; improper conduct (por exemplo, entre homem e mulher), indiscretion
間違いない: (まちがいない) - certain/sure/doubtless; I have no doubt/You can depend on it/It's a safe bet

間違いなし: (まちがいなし) - certain; sure; doubtless
間違い探し: (まちがいさがし) - spot the difference (puzzle); photo hunt
間違い無い: (まちがいない) - certain/sure/doubtless; I have no doubt/You can depend on it/It's a safe bet
間違い無く: (まちがいなく) - clearly; unmistakably; certainly; without a doubt
間違い無し: (まちがいなし) - certain; sure; doubtless
間違う: (まちがう) - to make a mistake; to be incorrect; to be mistaken
間違え: (まちがえ) - mistake/error/blunder; accident/mishap/trouble; improper conduct (e.g. between man and woman)/indiscretion
間違える: (まちがえる) - to make a mistake (in)/to commit an error (e.g. in calculation); to confuse/to mistake something for something else
間違っても: (まちがっても) - never (even in error); never, ever; never, no matter what happens; by no means
間遠: (まどお) - at long distance; in long intervals
間遮: (あいしゃ) - {shogi}  piece placed to block opponent's check; interposed piece
間間: (まま) - occasionally; now and then; sometimes

間隔計時機構: (かんかくけいじきこう) - interval timer
間際: (magiwa) - o ponto imediatamente anterior, o ponto de agir, à beira de acontecer

間食い: (あいだぐい) - eating between meals; snacking
間駒: (あいごま) - {shogi} piece placed to block opponent's check

間髪をいれず: (かんぱつをいれず) - in no time; in a flash

閔れむ: (あわれむ) - to commiserate/to pity/to have mercy on/to sympathize with/to sympathise with; (哀れむ only)  to enjoy the beauty of/to appreciate (e.g. the moon, flowers)
関: (kan/seki/kaká) - related , barrier, gate; seki (in go), mutual life

関わりあう: (かかわりあう) - to get involved or entangled in; to get mixed up in; to have something to do with; to have dealings with
関わり合う: (かかわりあう) - to get involved or entangled in; to get mixed up in; to have something to do with; to have dealings with
関わる: (かかわる) - to be affected/to be influenced; to be concerned with/to have to do with; to stick to (opinions)
